    • Method Detail

      • checkValue

        public static void checkValue​(String field,
                              Map<String,​Serializable> validation,
                              String value)
                       throws EndEntityFieldValidatorException
        Checks a value with a set of validators.
        Parameters:
        field - Name of field that is being checked. Can be a DN component name or another field name.
        validation - Map of validator classname and validator data.
        value - Value to validate
        Throws:
        EndEntityFieldValidatorException - if the given value does not pass validation

      • checkValidator

        public static void checkValidator​(String field,
                                  String className,
                                  Serializable validatorData)
                           throws EndEntityFieldValidatorException
        Checks that the given validator data is valid with the given validator.
        Parameters:
        field - Name of field that is being checked. Can be a DN component name or another field name.
        className - Class name of validator.
        validatorData - Validator-specific data to check (e.g. a regex for the RegexFieldValidator)
        Throws:
        EndEntityFieldValidatorException - If the given validator data is not valid, or if the validator class was not found
